items.name: AM:PM
items.desc:
Why not make up your own case?
AM:PM is a session IPA, allowing you to enjoy all the flavours and body of an IPA at a lower ABV.
Bags of tropical fruit aromas, pineapple, tangerine, guava and passion fruit are balanced with a chewy, honeyed malt character.
ABV 4.5% / 330ml bottle
HOPS  Ella / Citra / Nelson Sauvin / Amarillo
MALTS Maris Otter / Munich / Crystal
NOTABLE AWARDS
2020 - World Beer Awards : World's Best Speciality Gluten-free
2018 - SIBA National Independent Beer Awards, March Gold – Bottled Premium Bitters & Pale Ales
2017 - SIBA Midlands Beer Awards, November - Overall Champion Bottled Beer
You must be 18 or over to purchase this product.
The minimum order quantity for Pick and Mix is 12 beers and multiples thereof, without 12 beers or a multiple thereof in your cart your order will not be shipped.
Please note: Any bottles of AM:PM with a Best Before date of 05/05/2021 and later are now Gluten Free.

items.name: Astryd Juicy Pale Ale
items.desc:
Astryd is light, fresh and fruity. This juicy pale ale is overflowing with tropical fruit flavours and aromas from start to finish, with a delicate hop bitterness for balance.
ABV 3.8% / 440ml can
HOPS Crystal / Simcoe / Mosaic
MALTS Low Colour Maris Otter / Flaked Wheat / Wheat Malt
You have to be over 18 to purchase this product

items.name: Cocoa Wonderland
items.desc:
A full bodied, robust porter with natural mocha malt flavours from the complex malt grist, complementing the decadent additions of real chocolate to the maturation process.
ABV 6.8% / 330ml bottle
HOPS Magnum
MALTS Pale / Munich / Brown / Crystal / Wheat / Black
SPECIALTY Cacao Nibs

items.name: Crackendale
items.desc:
Crackendale explodes with a fantastic tropical fruit aroma, giving way to guava and ripe citrus which burst through on the palate with a beautiful bitter and sweet balance.
ABV 5.2% / 330ml bottle
HOPS Citra
MALTS Low Colour Maris Otter

items.name: Double Green Mountain ABV
items.desc:
A celebration of one of our most popular beers, amplified up to 8.6%. The soft mouthfeel and juicy, tropical fruit flavours are instantly recognisable as Green Mountain, but there’s an intensity that you only get with a bit more alcohol and body.
Fantastic flavours of pineapple, mango and guava are all in abundance and the enhanced malt base works to balance the huge hop additions.
ABV 8.6%
Hazy Vermont Double IPA
Hops Citra / Mosaic / Galaxy /Amarillo
Malts Low Colour Maris Otter / Wheat / Caramalt
The minimum order quantity for Pick & Mix is 12 beers and multiples thereof. Without 12 beers or a multiple thereof in your cart your order will not be shipped.
You have to be over 18 to buy this product
Vegan Friendly

items.name: Florida Weisse
items.desc:
A hazy and refreshing fruit sour that is bracingly tart. It pours with a pinkish hue and is absolutely brimming with the flavour of fresh raspberries. This product is Vegan friendly.
ABV 4.5% / 330ml can
HOPS None
MALTS Low Colour Maris Otter / Wheat
SPECIALTY Raspberries

items.name: Frisco California Common Beer
items.desc:
Frisco is our take on the esteemed California Common. We have used the
experimental hop HBC 522 for an alluring aroma of pine and mango which leads
into a light sweetness punctuated with caramel and orange. This style is brewed
for balance and drinkability, perfect for relaxing with after a long day.
HOPS HBC 522
MALTS Low Colour Maris Otter / Caramalt / Wheat
The minimum order quantity for Pick & Mix is 12 beers and multiples thereof. Without 12 beers or a multiple thereof in your cart your order will not be shipped.

items.name: Green Mountain
items.desc:

ABV 4.3% / 330ml can
Hops Galaxy / Mosaic / Citra / Amarillo
Malts Pale / Wheat / Caramalt

The first UK beer to use the Nelson Sauvin hop

items.name: Mikan Shimoda Pale
items.desc:
We are very excited to work with Tonkotsu on their own beer. We know they put their heart and soul into creating the perfect ramen and we have collaborated to create a beer we are all proud of.
This pale ale is beautifully light and fresh with a tantalizing sweet orange aroma. On the palate expect a crisp, citrusy character that will complement your favourite ramen.
ABV 3.8% / 330ml can
HOPS  Amarillo / Cashmere / Mandarina Bavaria
MALTS Low Colour Maris Otter / Wheat Malt / Flaked Wheat

items.name: Shelby - The Official Beer of the TV Series
items.desc:
The official beer of Peaky Blinders the TV series. Shelby is an India Pale Ale inspired by the style of beer consumed in 1919, at the time of The Peaky Blinders.
Shelby pours a golden amber in colour with a nose of stone fruit and red berries, a gentle maltiness on the palate and a wonderful citrusy lemon bitterness.
By Order of The Shelby Company LTD
ABV 5% / 330ml bottle
HOPS Fuggles / Bramling Cross
MALTS Maris Otter/ Crystal / Munich
